author: mbautin
msg: [jira] [HBASE-5382] [89-fb] Test that we always cache index and bloom blocks
This is the 89-fb version of https://reviews.facebook.net/D1695, nearly
This is a unit test that should have been part of HBASE-4683 but was not
committed. The original test was reviewed as part of
https://reviews.facebook.net/D807. Submitting unit test as a separate JIRA and
patch, and extending the scope of the test to also handle the case when block
cache is enabled for the column family.

author: chirino
msg: Fix for APLO-160 Apollo becoming unresponsive when stressed with 48k connections.
This if releases the read and write buffers when they are not needed.

author: pfg
msg: Cleanup remnants of glibc: if we ever need this functionality again we can use APR.

author: junrao
msg: shutdown watch executor thread properly; patched by Jun Rao; reviewed by Neha Narkhede; KAFKA-265
